message.body: hey lee remember how technology is awesome?
i was just reminded of this by the "remember how technology is awesome" feature on my new computer.
I bet we could even video chat!
Which we know from 60's sci fi is the ultimate futuristic experience and demarcation of how far science has come.
do you know how to video chat?
Yeah. I think you just click the "video and more" thing right under this chat-box, and it just does it for you. Technology is so Thoughtful!
aww. it is! but not quite thoughtful enough to let me start up video chat while continuing to watch battlestar galactica
